00024 #ifndef __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__UTCB_H__
00025 #define __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__UTCB_H__
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00028 
00039 enum L4_utcb_consts_arm
00040 {
00041   L4_UTCB_EXCEPTION_REGS_SIZE    = 20,
00042   L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE      = 63,
00043   L4_UTCB_GENERIC_BUFFERS_SIZE   = 58,
00044 
00045   L4_UTCB_MSG_REGS_OFFSET        = 0,
00046   L4_UTCB_BUF_REGS_OFFSET        = 64 * sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00047   L4_UTCB_THREAD_REGS_OFFSET     = 123 * sizeof(l4_umword_t),
00048 
00049   L4_UTCB_INHERIT_FPU            = 1UL << 24,
00050 
00051   L4_UTCB_OFFSET                 = 512,
00052 };
00053 
00058 typedef struct l4_exc_regs_t
00059 {
00060   l4_umword_t pfa;     
00061   l4_umword_t err;     
00063   l4_umword_t r[13];   
00064   l4_umword_t sp;      
00065   l4_umword_t ulr;     
00066   l4_umword_t _dummy1; 
00067   l4_umword_t pc;      
00068   l4_umword_t cpsr;    
00069 } l4_exc_regs_t;
00070 
00071 #include_next <l4/sys/utcb.h>
00072 
00073 /*
00074  * ==================================================================
00075  * Implementations.
00076  */
00077 
00078 #ifdef __GNUC__
00079 L4_INLINE l4_utcb_t *l4_utcb_direct(void) L4_NOTHROW
00080 {
00081   register l4_utcb_t *utcb __asm__ ("r0");
00082   __asm__ volatile ("mov lr, pc          \n"
00083                     "mov pc, #0xffffff00 \n"
00084                     : "=r"(utcb) : : "lr");
00085   return utcb;
00086 }
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t l4_utcb_exc_pc(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00090 {
00091   return u->pc;
00092 }
00093 
00094 L4_INLINE void l4_utcb_exc_pc_set(l4_exc_regs_t *u, l4_addr_t pc) L4_NOTHROW
00095 {
00096   u->pc = pc;
00097 }
00098 
00099 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t l4_utcb_exc_typeval(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00100 {
00101   return u->err;
00102 }
00103 
00104 L4_INLINE int l4_utcb_exc_is_pf(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00105 {
00106   return u->err & 0x00010000;
00107 }
00108 
00109 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_utcb_exc_pfa(l4_exc_regs_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00110 {
00111   return (u->pfa & ~3) | (!(u->err & 0x00020000) << 1);
00112 }
00113 
00114 #endif /* ! __L4_SYS__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__UTCB_H__ */
